manifest.name: es6-error
manifest.description: Easily-extendable error for use with ES6 classes

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es6
scripts.build:cjs: mkdir -p lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src/index.js -o lib/index.js
scripts.build:es6: mkdir -p es6 && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es6 babel src/index.js -o es6/index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
